Module Minesweeper
Package swe.group_nine.controller

Class AbstractController

java.lang.Object
swe.group_nine.controller.AbstractController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Controller
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameController
public abstract class AbstractController
extends java.lang.Object
implements Controller
The AbstractController class implements the controller as an abstract model for the minesweeper game
